column5: Headed to sharbot lake on Thursday ,   For a three day batchelor party walleye tourney.   What depths should I target mid summer?  Would trolling dipsies with cranks and spoons be a good place to start?   I  have no clue the only place I fish for walleyes is the lower French its pretty simple up there.  Sharbot is a med. sized lake with lots of deep water by the looks of it.  Any advise will be put to good use. Thanks.
Find the weed edges in the morning/evenings with access to deep water, you'll find the walleye.
